group_1.textLeft: The orca show was soooo much fun!@Orcas are really smart!

group_1.textRight: Where shall we head to next?

group_1.textLeft: Waah! What was that?!

group_1.textRight: That... must have been from the amusement@park nearby. There is a roller coaster there.
There's a famous amusement park in Asunaro City,@too.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, Lavieland!
I go there a lot with Umika and Kaoru!
Umika's voice gets hoarse every time.

group_1.textRight: Hey, wait...!
Why's that?! Do y'all do screaming contests@at the amusement park?

group_1.textLeft: The very thought of that confuses me...
Roller coaster or haunted house,@she just keeps on screaming!

group_1.textRight: Umikamin, are you unexpectedly a scaredy-cat?
Do you actually like amusement parks?
If so, we could alter our plans and take you there.
We'll still be fine schedule-wise if it's just one@attraction.

group_1.textLeft: I have a feeling all of you are expecting strange@things out of me, so I'll pass...

group_1.textRight: Then... how about some tea at the shop nearby?

group_1.textLeft: This flavor...!@There's definitely banana and apple in here.
And then, rosemaryyy!

group_1.textRight: Whoooooooooa?! How'd you know?
To be able to guess the smoothie recipe like that@is something else...

group_1.textLeft: The banana bit's obvious!@And the herb tastes strong too, so it's easy to tell.

group_1.textRight: Could you tell, Kaoru?

group_1.textLeft: Nope, not at all.

group_1.textRight: That seems quite unusual...
This has been one of Kamihama's more popular@shops lately,
but what kind of place do girls in Asunaro City go to?

group_1.textLeft: Right... was there any particularly popular place...?
"Lepa Mačka".
Their raspberry pie's been a crazy hot topic.

group_1.textRight: What's that?@Is it one of those crazy-not-to-know things?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, not that kinda place.@It's just a small shop with tea and snacks.

group_1.textRight: That's the shop where I talked with Umika before.
It's a fantastic Western café that was even featured@on TV.
Oh, I remember now!
When we met before,@Kazumin had a flyer for that shop!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's the place!
It's a shop I really like.@I actually know the manager there,
but it's gotten really famous lately.@Some days it gets so full that I can't even get in.

group_1.textRight: That thing I mentioned earlier,
the raspberry pie, exploded in popularity.
What other menu items do they have?

group_1.textLeft: In the end, the house special's gotta be@the Bucket o' Parfait!

group_1.textRight: A "bucket"...?
What in the heck is that?!@A bucket with, like, parfait in it?

group_1.textLeft: It sounds like a lie, but it's the truth!

group_1.textRight: Exactly what it says on the tin, huh...
Um, is it profitable for them?

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sure it isn't.

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: Seems like Kazumi basically forced it@onto the shop's menu.
Mr. Tachibana, the manager, spoils her a lotー
And one more thing, you can't forget the strawberry@risotto on the secret menu!

group_1.textRight: Strawberry risotto?!

group_1.textLeft: I don't think that one needs any explanation...

group_1.textRight: ...It's a risotto with strawberries in it, I'm sure.
Crazy! I totes wanna have some!

group_1.textLeft: Really? Then I'll make some for you!

group_1.textRight: You will, Kazumin?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it's my specialty! I know the recipe!
And if I'm gonna make that, I may as well also give@the Bucket o' Parfait
and the raspberry pie a try!
Though I may not be able to reproduce those@perfectly!

group_1.textRight: For real?! I'm down!
...And where are you going to make this?

group_1.textLeft: Hmmmm, what do I do?

group_1.textRight: Then, how about Walnut's?

group_1.textLeft: Manaka's restaurant?

group_1.textRight: Since today's their day off,@they'll probably lend us their kitchen.
I'll give them a call.

group_1.textLeft: ...What'd they say?

group_1.textRight: They agreed!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks!
With that settled, I'm gonna go do some shopping!

group_1.textRight: You're going all by yourself? We'll come with you!

group_1.textLeft: I'm pretty picky when it comes to ingredients,@so I'd rather go on my own.
It's all right, I'm not being considerate or anything!

group_1.textRight: Do you know where Walnut's is located?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
So anyway, go to Walnut's and wait for me,@everyone!

group_1.textCenter: I'm gonna make a strawberry risotto@like they wouldn't believe!
